item.title: About me
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ I’m Edoardo! I’m a software engineer based in Italy. I’m currently working at Elastic, the search company, as a software engineer in the Integrations team for Elastic Observability. Before that, I’ve been a DevOps engineer at Arduino, the Open-Source electronic prototyping platform.
